metadata.title: CVE-2025-21687 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vfio/platform: check the bounds of read/write syscallscount and offset are passed from user space and not checked, onlyoffset is capped to 40 bits, which can be used to read/write out ofbounds of the device.
